items.title: Version - 6.0.0
items.content: Due to major enhancements and usage of the WordPress 6.2 APIs, I will increase the version to 6 as soon as WordPress 6.2 is released. Just for the sake of being inline with WP :) .

items.title: Next update - 5.7.2 (aka 6.0.0)
items.content: Next update will remove `__experimentalLayout` from core/template-part and use useRootPaddingAwareAlignments, so you will need to edit your home/single/page.html (and others) templates. If you did not make any significant changes to those templates you can simply reset them and redo those small changes.
